Detailed Description

Represent one connection in the tree that are displayed in the StreetSegmentItemInfoDialog.

Contains information about the connection and will, if clicked, highlight the connection on the map.

Definition at line 428 of file MERouteableItemInfoWidget.h.

MEMapArea *  mapArea,
const char *  streetName,
bool  externalConnection
) 
 

Create a new node for a connection in the tree.

Parameters:
name The text-representation of the connection.
toNode The node where the connection is stored.
conn The connection.
myDialog The dialog where the tree-node will be displayed. To be able to e.g. call getMapArea().
streetName The name of the street where the connection starts.
externalConnection True if conn is an external connection, false otherwise.
